name: Sheriff Ewing
description:
Armed robbers are trying to blow up a bank! Help sheriff Ewing stop them. But beware they have a lot of armed thugs that will try to stop you!

Made for Nokia 3310 Jam.

Controls:

  • WASD / Arrows - Moving in-game and in the menu.
  • Space - Shooting and selecting buttons in menu
  • ESC - Returns you back to menu
  • F - Toggle fullscreen

The Mac version is untested but should work.
